BR_text.BRdescription:
There is currently an error thrown by the plot visualizer that occurs when restarting an individual job:
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/75995147-9df50100-5ec1-11ea-9eb2-0b1668054ea2.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Even if there is something happening incorrectly in the restart logic, this should fail gracefully and not throw an exception...

comments_0.comment_text: For this to work correctly, the else block should only be executed if and only if desc has a subPlot.
